note.p: Barrister. Educated at Christ Church college, Oxford, and Lincoln’s Inn; called to the bar, 1857. JP in Monmouthshire. Resided in Wotton, Surrey, 1881.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office, RG11/794/97/19)
England and Wales national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations) 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 7 January 2014)
